description: This file provides utility functions for feature flag management in a React application, including parsing environment variables, applying flags as DOM attributes, generating class names, and initializing flags on import.

methods.name: getFeatureFlags
methods.description: Parses environment variables to determine feature flags, with defaults and environment-based overrides.

methods.name: applyFlagsToDocument
methods.description: Sets data-attributes on the document element based on feature flags for CSS styling.

methods.name: getFlagClassNames
methods.description: Generates space-separated class names based on feature flags for use in class attributes.

methods.name: initFeatureFlags
methods.description: Initializes feature flags by resolving and applying them, returning the flags.
